prompt: Amidst an unsettling yet awe-inspiring spectacle, a colossal supercell thunderstorm dwarfs the expansive landscape below, swirling with ominous energy. The scene is framed from the vantage point of a solitary grove of ancient oak trees, their sturdy branches twisting skyward as if challenging the heavens. This dense thicket occupies the foreground, adding a contrasting element of stability against the churning chaos above. In the midground, an expansive field of tall, golden-tan grasses shudders in the gusty winds, swaying rhythmically as if acknowledging the storm's approaching wrath. The background is dominated by a horizon-spanning bank of tumultuous, layered cumulonimbus clouds, their dark, billowy masses appearing as an impenetrable wall of nature's fury. The storm is lit dramatically by errant streaks of lightning, which illuminate the clouds in fleeting bursts of stark, electric whites and purples. These vivid flashes cast sharp, ever-shifting shadows against the landscape, creating a dynamic interplay of light and dark. The color palette of the scene is a haunting blend of deep grays and blacks from the storm clouds, juxtaposed with the warm, muted tones of the field, creating a mood of tense anticipation. The overall mood of the image is one of powerful, almost primal energy, as if capturing a moment on the brink of unleashing nature's full force. Captured in stunning detail, the image is reminiscent of fine art landscape photography, characterized by its high-resolution quality, where each blade of grass and every ripple in the cloud formation is depicted with striking clarity and precision.

rewritten_prompts: A colossal supercell thunderstorm dominates the vast landscape, swirling with intense power. From the viewpoint of a lone grove of ancient oaks, whose twisted branches reach skyward, the scene captures a dense thicket in the foreground, providing stability against the storm's chaos. In the midground, tall golden grasses shudder in the gusty winds, swaying in rhythm with the storm's wrath. The horizon is lined with a bank of cumulus clouds, their dark masses forming a wall of nature's fury. Lightning flashes illuminate the clouds with stark whites and purples, casting shifting shadows across the land. The scene's colors blend stormy grays and blacks with warm field tones, projecting a mood of tense anticipation. The powerful energy captured here feels ready to unleash nature's full might, resembling fine art landscape photography with high-resolution clarity in every detail.

In the midground, a field of tall, golden grasses quakes under the gusty winds, moving rhythmically in acknowledgment of the storm's threat. Dramatic lightning bolts illuminate the clouds with bursts of white and purple, casting dynamic shadows below. The scene's colors mix deep storm hues with warmer field tones, creating a mood of anticipation.
